entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Delegate creation with optional methods throw TargetParameterCountException when Dispatcher consumes #72922
  • In IIncrementalValuesProvider method Where with CancellationToken is not accessible. #72919
  • Unexpected ```IInvalidOperation``` for ref returning property as a target of member initializer #72916
  • Unexpected conversion error for a deconstruction involving `dynamic` type #72914
  • Meaningless nullability warning is reported for deconstruction #72913

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34806.19 #72921

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to a batching work queue for saving sourcetexts #72926
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use string syntax attribute to highlight tests #72924
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify description builder #72917
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify token creation. #72915
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary discards #72925
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove more usages of specialized collections in favor of collection exprs #72918
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pin solutions when doing fix all operation #72909
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move some tests over to being raw strings #72923
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve asset hints to speed up searching #72902
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to using index operator #72911
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify code using SyntaxFactory. #72901
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix returning valid pp symbol info on unrelated preprocessor directives #72910
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Invocations statically bound in presence of dynamic arguments should have `dynamic` result if their dynamic binding succeeded in C# 12 #72885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
